objects.text:
• Spacious Stylish Design
• Durable Faux Leather
• Perfect For Everyday Use
• Gold Accent Hardware

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium product advertisement with a sophisticated and minimalistic design tailored for a fashion brand. The background is divided into two sections: the upper part features a warm beige tone with subtle line and arc embellishments, while the lower half has a lighter cream tone to maintain contrast and focus. The heading layer (`heading`) is placed prominently at the top left in bold uppercase serif font, followed by the elegant subheading (`subheading`) underneath it. A concise list (`description`) highlighting product features is aligned below. The price tag (`price`) is bold and eye-catching in the bottom left. A rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with contrasting text (`cta`) reinforces shopping intent. A product image (`product_image`) of the leather tote with gold accents is placed on the right side, perfectly balancing the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Brown #8B5A2B (heading, price)
- Beige #E6D7CB (top background)
- Cream #F8F3EE (bottom background)
- Gold Accent #D9BC7F to #BF9B57 (gradient lines)
- Taupe #B39475 (subheading, button)
- Soft Brown #5D4937 (description text)
- White #FFFFFF (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a warm camel brown color (#A47555), which serves as the dominant hue. This neutral tone conveys elegance and versatility. Subtle texture detailing enhances its refined look, while smooth blending across the surface adds dimension. Accents of polished gold (#D4AF37) hardware — including decorative chains, charms, and studs — highlight key elements without overpowering the base color. The ALDO logo and metal embellishments are also in shimmering gold, providing a luxurious contrast. A complementary cream-white (#F5F5F5) or soft beige (#E8D9C4) backdrop can be used in ads to create a clean, upscale presentation.
